document.title: ISE 2015: Proxi, Seed Leads Europe in Bluetooth Home Automation
document.author: Cdric Locqueneux
document.text: Bluetooth Smart (BLE) as a home automation platform hasnt quite taken off in Europe as in North America, but Proxi (powered by Seed) has a good head start. (Julie Jacobson / CE Pro) Lire larticle complet sur CE Pro News Stories bluetooth Proxi Seed Leads Veille
